content.rendered:
EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA HILUX 2005 – 2011

A tough full replacement winch bar that enhanses the look of your vehicle, provides an excellent angle of approach, includes full bash plate protection, and fully winch compatible . Why look like a truck when you can have the same features and look like this.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in white or black. It is a 3 and 5mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in black and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

-The Hilux Evolution bumper is tested here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold as no cuts or modification is required.

– The bar is designed for wide body Hilux, or narrow body with aftermarket flares.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated imported Fog lights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Light mounting bar

Additional Driving lights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT HILUX 2005 – 2011

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
